title: That's Ridiculous, Said Nicholas
description: Nicholas Jon Paul Martin William Annabelle Tydings wants to be treated like a sensible child, but people often tell him things he knows cannot be true. Nicholas reacts to the hype with a matter-of-fact refrain that will amuse and delight young readers. The story shows how positive feedback and good common sense help build healthy self-esteem. When children love themselves they can also show loving-kindness to others.Parents may also notice a more subtle theme that children respond better to praise than to criticism.
author: Cheryl Taragin
